scripts.pre-release: git add . && git commit -m 'Pre-release commit' || echo 'Nothing to commit'
scripts.release:major: npm run pre-release && npm version major && npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for major release' && git push origin main --tags && zip -r dist-v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version").zip dist/* && gh release create v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version") dist-v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version").zip --title 'Release v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")' --notes 'Major release v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")'
scripts.release:minor: npm run pre-release && npm version minor && npm run build && git add dist && (git commit -m 'Build and dist update for minor release' || echo 'No changes to commit') && git push origin main --tags && zip -r dist-v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version").zip dist/* && gh release create v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version") dist-v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version").zip --title 'Release v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")' --notes 'Minor release v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")'
scripts.release:patch: npm run pre-release && npm version patch && npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for patch release' && git push origin main --tags && zip -r dist-v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version").zip dist/* && gh release create v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version") dist-v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version").zip --title 'Release v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")' --notes 'Patch release v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")'
